result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason Darin Figg

records.addlTxt:
11:04 AM Defendant Jason Darin Figg appeared by video, in custody. Attorney Breanna Magallones in court for Jason Darin Figg.  Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Victim was to appear via zoom but has not joined. 
Calling 22cf32, 22cm41 for status and 22cf218 for AIA.  Defendant would like 22cf218 charges read to him.  Magallones statement.  Prepared to waive preliminary hearing on 22cf218 today.  Defendant waives preliminary hearing. Waiver free and voluntary. Court finds that probable cause exists and binds over. Schiek states Information will be filed that mirrors Complaint. Magallones willing to proceed to Arraignment today; waives further reading and enters not guilty pleas. 
Magallones request JT and PTC be set.  22CM41 was originally set as the first JT.  or request 22cf32 be set for trial - 
Court will set 22cf32 for jury trial 12-16-22 @ 8:30 am. other 2 cases will be status that date. Court sets additional PTC for 12-6 which will be held in 1st floor hearing rom.  
Bail continued in all 3 cases. .
Pre-trial conference scheduled for December 6, 2022 at 11:30 am.
Jury trial scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

1:17 PM Defendant Jason Darin Figg appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Breanna Magallones appearing in court. Court review of cases. 22CF218 set for an initial appearance. Magallones will be representing on new case. Schiek/Magallones statement to bond. In receipt of complaint, right to counsel. Court sets cash bond of $1000 in each case. Case to transfer to Branch I. 01:23 PM
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for October 6, 2022 at 11:00 am.
additional cash bond to prior bond
Per Rachel, ONSO - in custody
to forfeit bond

1:34 PM Defendant Jason Darin Figg not in court. Attorney Breanna Magallones in court for Jason Darin Figg. Attorney Michael William Schiek in court for State of Wisconsin. Victim appearing telephonically. Calling 22CF32 & 22CM41. Magallones does not know Defendant's whereabouts. Court authorizes body warrant only in each case. adj. 01:36 PM

2:03 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason Darin Figg in court. Attorney Breanna Magallones in court for Jason Darin Figg. Victim appearing telephonically. Calling 22CF32 & 22CM41. Schiek states offer was forwarded - Defendant has not accepted - would like to set out. Magallones in agreement. Schiek states 22CM41 would be set for 1 day trial. Bond continued. adj. 02:07 PM
Jury Trial scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 20, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

3:02 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant Jason Darin Figg in court.  Attorney Elizabeth Svehlek appearing specially for Breanna Magallones in court for Jason Darin Figg. Victim appearing telephonically. Calling 22CF32 & 22CM41. Schiek states offer was submitted - Defendant was running late - attorney Magallones had to leave. Svehlek states would like to set out. Defendant states was in North Carolina in AODA - Defendant states he is in Rhinelander now - living in vehicle - mail is going to North Carolina/sponsors house - will be going back to North Carolina - has job - states cell number. Bond continued. adj. 03:09 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 28, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

2:33 PM Prosecuting attorney Michael William Schiek in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Jason Darin Figg in court.  Attorney Breanna Magallones in court for Jason Darin Figg. Victim appearing by video. Calling 22CF32 & 22CM41. Schiek does not believe matter is resolved. Magallones would like to set out - statement to housing/treatment. Bond continued. adj. 02:35 PM
Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 24, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
